subject: Horse Racing
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Shug McGaughey has won the Midsummer Derby three times. He waited nine years to saddle another one, and now his horse must run down this year’s Kentucky Derby winner.
snippet: Shug McGaughey has won the Midsummer Derby three times. He waited nine years to saddle another one, and now his horse must run down this year’s Kentucky Derby winner.
